item.title: It's a Sidekick and a Running Mate
item.description:
The T-Mobile Sidekick Slide is perfect for those who love to stay connected. Its compact design easily fits into your pocket, keeping you in touch even during a workout. While it functions as a cell phone, its primary use lies in its messaging capabilities. Accessing the full QWERTY keyboard is as simple as sliding the phone open, transforming it into a miniature computer. The large, vibrant display and physical keys enhance the user experience...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/its-a-sidekick-and-a-running-mate/

item.title: Can iPhone 3G S Be The Universal Gadget?
item.description:
People love electronics but hate carrying a lot of them around. A single, universal gadget would be ideal â€“ one that combines the functions of a cell phone, TV, camera, computer, and more. Such a device would need to be a phone, TV, DVR, high-quality camera, camcorder, audio recorder, navigation system, gaming console, computer, messaging system, productivity tool, radio, eBook reader, music player, stock trading platform, watch, alarm clock, weather tracker, and shopping service...

item.title: Asia Atlantic Airlines will provide SmartTray tables for passengers to use with their mobile devices
item.description:
Asia Atlantic Airlines will soon be outfitting their planes with SmartTray X1 tray tables, designed to make using electronic devices easier for passengers. The new tray tables feature a groove specifically for holding tablets, e-readers, and smartphones. These trays will be available to passengers flying in the premium economy cabin of Asia Atlantic Airlines’ Boeing 767-300ER aircraft. Source: SmartTray International. Bobby Haque, President of Asia Atlantic Airlines, believes these trays will improve the travel experience...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/asia-atlantic-airlines-will-provide-smarttray-tables-for-passengers-to-use-with-their-mobile-devices/
